title: Public access to procurement information
context: ยง103D-105 Public access to procurement information. Government records relating to procurement shall be available to the public as provided in chapter 92F. Part I of chapter 92 shall not apply to discussions, deliberations, or decisions required to be conducted or made confidentially under this chapter. [L Sp 1993, c 8, pt of ยง2; am L 1995, c 178, ยง4]
